name: Ancient Skills Library
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Both parts required for this process can be found in Albtraum #L "Empty Ancient Device" "267709" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Engineer" "267714" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Empty Ancient Device + Crystalised Memories of a Engineer = #L "Ancient Skills Library" "267652" Skills: | 1250 CL |
